<h1 align="center">
  StyleBox
</h1>

<p align="center">Collection of designer map styles for MapBox.</p>


### How to use these styles?
Get your API key from [MapBox](https://mapbox.com) and use the MapStyle link to change the theme of your map.

### Contribute
Create a new sub directory inside `maps/` with your style name and fill in the details of your style in a markdown file. Copy a screenshot of your mapstyle in the same directory and them through! :sparkle:
```
---
slug: '/dracula'
name: 'Darcula'
url: 'mapbox://styles/haxzie/ck0cc2cdn01241eohsj4fcz5p'
cover: './cover.png'
author: 'Musthaq Ahamad'
github: 'haxzie'
date: '2019-09-14'
---
```
